title: Alan Wake 2 is ANOTHER Game of The Year Contender - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.26.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Blessing and Tim chat about Alan Wake 2 reviews, Xbox has a new president, and a new update on Skull and Bones.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:03 - Housekeeping
Today— Greg’s joining the jabroni boys to stream a BRAND NEW GHOSTBUSTERS GAME! That’s right, Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord is out tomorrow, and we’re all suiting up to play in a sponsored stream. Catch it live after KFGD or later on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now and it’s our Alan Wake 2 Review (So Far) featuring Parris Lily. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
In case you missed it, Kinda Funny Xcast yesterday was our reaction and breakdown of Xbox’s Partner Preview event. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
You can get some cool KF Halloween Merch right now on Kindafunny.com/store
Over on Patreon:
A new Kinda Feudy is up where I ask the crew to name a Naughty Dog villain and you won’t believe what the number one answer is.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: JedimasterDeadpool & Delaney Twining
The Roper Report   -
00:08:30 - Alan Wake 2 Review Round Up
00:18:30 - Do you think that the Narrative & Detective aspects of the game outweigh the Survival Horror aspects enough to warrant a play-through? - Best Friends Q:itzaMeBT (Brian Thomas)
00:20:52 - Alan Wake 2 Dev Remedy Confirms Two Expansions Coming in 2024 - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:25:10 - Microsoft reorgs its Xbox and marketing teams to prepare for an AI and gaming future - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:30:30 - Ubisoft Delays Skull And Bones And An Upcoming "Large" Game - Mark Delaney @ Gamespot
00:30:30 - Ad
00:37:40 - Capcom says it’s on track for an 11th straight year of growth after strong sales - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:42:2 - PS5 Slim's Optional Disc Drive Needs to Connect to the Internet to Pair It to a Console - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:46:45 - Out Today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:07 - With the digital only future barrelling towards us, how long until the majority of big releases go to digital only? - Willystyle65
00:51:52 - You‘re Wrong
00:55:57 - The Post Show!
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Greg
